price: Wakasema: ewe baba yetu, tusamehe Dhambi zetu hapana shaka sisi, tulikuwa na Makosa.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ
footnotes: Hapo wakamkabili kwa kumtaka msamaha, wakimtaraji awasamehe, na awatakie kwa Mwenyezi Mungu maghfira kwa madhambi yao. Kwani wao walimhakikishia katika kule kutubu kwao kwamba wao walikuwa ni wenye kutenda madhambi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā is'taghfir lanā dhunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭiīna
